assignments.name: Assign_Bucket_Fund_Line_Item_to_Create
assignments.label: Assign Bucket Fund Line Item to Create

assignments.name: Assign_Schedule_Line_Item_to_Create
assignments.label: Assign Schedule Line Item to Create

decisions.description: If this flow was started by selecting a checkbox from a List of Records, the input will be in a text collection of Ids instead of the single text variable, recordId.
decisions.name: Started_from_Record_or_List
decisions.label: Started from Record or List?

formulas.name: f_Ending_Opp_Product_Billing_Note
formulas.expression: TEXT(MONTH({!$Flow.CurrentDate})) &"/" &TEXT(DAY({!$Flow.CurrentDate})) &"/" &RIGHT(TEXT(YEAR({!$Flow.CurrentDate})),2) &" " &UPPER(LEFT({!$User.Alias},2)) &": [" & {!var_Finance_Request_Record.Name} & "] " & IF({!Screen_Select_Action}={!choice_Allocate_Funds}, "Allocated $" & TEXT({!var_Amount}), "Refunded $" & TEXT({!var_Amount})) &" billed " &TEXT(MONTH({!var_Starting_Schedule.ScheduleDate})) &"/" &TEXT(DAY({!var_Starting_Schedule.ScheduleDate})) &"/" &RIGHT(TEXT(YEAR({!var_Starting_Schedule.ScheduleDate})),2) & IF({!Screen_Select_Action}={!choice_Allocate_Funds}, " from product '", " to product '") & {!var_Starting_Opp_Product.Product_Name__c} & "' " & BR() & IF({!var_Ending_Opp_Product.Billing_Note__c}="", "", BR()&{!var_Ending_Opp_Product.Billing_Note__c})

formulas.name: f_Starting_Opp_Product_Billing_Note
formulas.expression: TEXT(MONTH({!$Flow.CurrentDate})) &"/" &TEXT(DAY({!$Flow.CurrentDate})) &"/" &RIGHT(TEXT(YEAR({!$Flow.CurrentDate})),2) &" " &UPPER(LEFT({!$User.Alias},2)) &": [" & {!var_Finance_Request_Record.Name} & "] " & IF({!Screen_Select_Action}={!choice_Allocate_Funds}, "Allocated $" & TEXT({!var_Amount}), "Refunded $" & TEXT({!var_Amount})) &" billed " &TEXT(MONTH({!var_Starting_Schedule.ScheduleDate})) &"/" &TEXT(DAY({!var_Starting_Schedule.ScheduleDate})) &"/" &RIGHT(TEXT(YEAR({!var_Starting_Schedule.ScheduleDate})),2) & IF({!Screen_Select_Action}={!choice_Allocate_Funds}, " to product '", " from product '") & {!var_Ending_Opp_Product.Product_Name__c} & "' " & BR() & IF({!var_Starting_Opp_Product.Billing_Note__c}="", "", BR()&{!var_Starting_Opp_Product.Billing_Note__c})

fields.name: dt_Flow_Header_ErrorScreen4
fields.fieldText: {!tt_Flow_Header_Bucket_Fund_Request}

fields.name: Copy_1_of_dt_Error_Creating_Finance_Request
fields.fieldText:
Oops! There was an error while attaching files to the Bucket Fund Transfer Request.


Please share the following error message with your Salesforce Administrator at salesforce@erepublic.com:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: dt_Flow_Header_ErrorScreen3
fields.fieldText: {!tt_Flow_Header_Bucket_Fund_Request}

fields.name: dt_Error_Creating_Finance_Request
fields.fieldText:
Oops! There was an error creating the Bucket Fund Transfer Request.


Please share the following error message with your Salesforce Administrator at salesforce@erepublic.com:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: dt_Please_Select_One_Bucket
fields.fieldText: Oops! Please select exactly (1) Bucket Fund to Allocate or Refund funds to.

fields.name: dt_Flow_Header_ErrorScreen1
fields.fieldText: {!tt_Flow_Header_Bucket_Fund_Request}

fields.name: dt_Oops_Allocation_Amount_Overage
fields.fieldText:
Oops! The allocation amount cannot exceed the Amount Available in the Bucket Fund.


Allocation Amount: ${!var_Amount}


Amount Available: ${!var_Bucket_Fund.Amount_Available__c}

fields.name: dt_Oops_Refund_Amount_Overage
fields.fieldText:
Oops! The refund amount cannot exceed the Amount Used from the Bucket Fund or the Amount on the selected Schedule.


Refund Amount: ${!var_Amount}


Amount Used: ${!var_Bucket_Fund.Amount_Used__c}

Schedule Amount: {!Table_Schedules.firstSelectedRow.Revenue}

screens.name: Oops_No_Opp_Product
screens.label: Oops - No Opp Product or Schedule

fields.name: dt_Error_Missing_Opp_Product_or_Schedule
fields.fieldText:
Oops! The bucket fund is either missing a Schedule or Opportunity Product, which are required for a Bucket Fund Allocation.


Please review and update the bucket fund.

fields.name: dt_Missing_Opportunity_Product
fields.fieldText:
Oops! The bucket fund is missing an Opportunity Product or has no funds used, which are required for a Bucket Fund Refund.


Please review and update the bucket fund.

screens.name: Oops_Opportunity_Products_are_the_Same
screens.label: Oops Opportunity Products are the Same

fields.name: dt_Flow_Header_ErrorScreen2
fields.fieldText: {!tt_Flow_Header_Bucket_Fund_Request}

fields.name: dt_Oops_Same_Opp_Product
fields.fieldText: Oops! You cannot reallocate money from and to the same Opp Product.

fields.name: dt_Oops_Selections_Missing_Allocate
fields.fieldText: Oops! Please go back and select the Opportunity Product to allocate Bucket Funds to.

fields.name: dt_Oops_Selections_Missing_Refund
fields.fieldText: Oops! Please go back and select BOTH the Opportunity Product and the Schedule to refund back to the Bucket Fund.

fields.name: dt_Flow_Header_Success_Screen
fields.fieldText: {!tt_Flow_Header_Bucket_Fund_Request}

fields.name: dt_Success_Message
fields.fieldText:
Success! Your Bucket Fund transfer has been completed.


View Bucket Fund transfer
